steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d5oil","text":"a. Dip slides in Propar 20 times then let sit for 10 min. Repeat step 3x, each time with fresh Propar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fcq4","text":"c. Dip slides in 100% reagent alcohol 20 times then let sit for 1 min 30 sec. Repeat step with fresh alcohol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c94s","text":"d. Dip slides in 90% reagent alcohol 20 times then let sit for 1 min 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jnin","text":"e. Place the slides under running DI water for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B3DA2020902111EC93DB0D134ABB4C8A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m4o5","text":"a. {"blocks":[{"key":"31gt7","text":"b. Cover slides with plastic Shandon coverplates and place them into the Freequenza rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0bf","text":"c. Wash with 1mL of PBS-T and watch the flowrate through the Freequenza  apparatus. {"blocks":[{"key":"5g18h","text":"a. Place 100uL of Hoechst 1:1000 (PBS) ( 10mg/mL stock) on each slide, incubate for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6lnh","text":"b. Wash 3X with 1mL of PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bucmg","text":"\nCoverslip with 2-3 drops of ProLong Gold antifade mounting medium without DAPI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekeib","text":"Remove excess mounting media: Using a lab vacuum aspirator pull the excess from the edges of the cover glass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7el1l","text":"Lay flat and allow to dry for at least 24 hours in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkt4b","text":"    a. Working in small batches remove slides from Freequenza and lay flat","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6j15","text":"    b. Tap excess PBS off the slides ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckf2c","text":"    c. Overlay slides with TrueBlack Lipofuscin Autofluorescence Quencher (diluted 1:20 with 70% ethanol) incubate for approximately 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ed36","text":"    d. Place slides into a Coplin jar and fill with PBS. Let sit for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfte6","text":"    e. Overfill the jar to allow residual TrueBlack to come to the top of the buffer surface. Discard the buffer from Coplin   jar and refill it. Let sit for 10 min.
